title: Batman: Arkham City GOTY
notes:
Performance: Runs ok. Not so smooth as running on Windows directly, but it's playable

Workaround: Game wasn't opening. Crashed with this message:

System.InvalidTimeZoneException: Exception of type 'System.InvalidTimeZoneException' was thrown.
at System.TimeZoneInfo.FromRegistryKey (System.String id, Microsoft.Win32.RegistryKey key) [0x00014] in <773ec02b42f74a918ccd74911c8063c9>:0

Searching on web, discovered that removing /etc/localtime symlink (which in my case points to ../usr/share/zoneinfo/America/Sao_Paulo) solves the issue and the game opens
